title: Bridge to Terabithia
description: Enter the magical kingdom of Terabithia with Jess and Leslie. Your choices will shape their friendship and the fate of their imaginary world.

characters.name: Jess Aarons
characters.description: An artistic boy who dreams of being the fastest runner in school
characters.background: Fifth-grader from a struggling family who loves to draw and run

characters.name: Leslie Burke
characters.description: A creative and fearless girl who becomes Jess's best friend
characters.background: New girl in town with wealthy, intellectual parents

characters.name: May Belle Aarons
characters.description: Jess's younger sister who looks up to him
characters.background: Jess's little sister who wants to be included in everything

checkpoints.title: Meeting Leslie
checkpoints.context: Jess meets the new girl Leslie Burke
checkpoints.sceneDescription: Leslie beats Jess in the race he's been training for all summer, and he must decide how to react to this unexpected challenge.

jess.text: Be angry and resentful about losing
Admire Leslie's courage and befriend her

checkpoints.title: Creating Terabithia
checkpoints.context: Jess and Leslie discover their secret kingdom
checkpoints.sceneDescription: Leslie suggests creating an imaginary kingdom in the woods, and they must decide how to build their magical world.

leslie.text: Make Terabithia a place of pure imagination
Use Terabithia to solve real-world problems
Invite others to join their kingdom

checkpoints.title: The Storm
checkpoints.context: A dangerous storm threatens their access to Terabithia
checkpoints.sceneDescription: Heavy rains have made the creek dangerous, but Leslie wants to visit Terabithia. Jess must make a crucial decision.

jess.text: Insist on going to Terabithia together
Go to the museum trip instead

baseScript: Jess Aarons has been practicing all summer to become the fastest runner in the fifth grade...
